text: Woman Without Tears (Spanish: La mujer sin lágrimas) is a 1951 Mexican historical drama film directed by Alfredo B. Crevenna and starring Libertad Lamarque, Marga López and Ernesto Alonso.Sadlier p.17 ==Cast== * Libertad Lamarque as Consuelo * Marga López as Beatriz * Ernesto Alonso as Carlos * Francisco Jambrina as Alejandro * Maruja Grifell as Claudia * Eduardo Alcaraz as Señor cura * Miguel Ángel López as Javier * Alma Delia Fuentes as Rita * Daniel Arroyo as Coronel * Carmen Cabrera as Profesora * Lupe Carriles as Doña Pachita * Ethel Carrillo as Jerónima * Enedina Díaz de León as Sirvienta de Beatriz * Conchita Gentil Arcos as Sarita * Georgina González as Invitada a boda * Ana María Hernández as Invitada al recital * Elodia Hernández as Antonia, sirvienta * Cecilia Leger as Pueblerina * Inés Murillo as Enfermera * Diana Ochoa as Belinda == References == == Bibliography == * Darlene J. Sadlier. Latin American Melodrama: Passion, Pathos, and Entertainment. University of Illinois Press, 2009. == External links == * Category:1951 films Category:1950s historical drama films Category:Mexican historical drama films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by Alfredo B. Crevenna Category:Films set in the 19th century Category:1951 drama films
title: Woman Without Tears
